testsuite.system-out: Go to https://www.amazon.com Enter 'Tent' into the search input field Attempt to select non-existent 'Camping' category from the dropdown. THIS WILL CAUSE TEST TO FAIL

Go to https://www.amazon.com Enter 'Magnifying Glass' into the search input field Select 'Industrial & Scientific' category from the dropdown Select search Verify search bar and category selected are still populated Select 'Free Shipping by Amazon' checkbox Verify all items listed for 'Magnifying Glass' are for prime delivery only Select a 'Magnifying Glass' to purchase Add QTY of '7' Magnifying Glass to cart Verify ‘Added to Cart’ displays Select ‘Cart’ Verify correct quantity of items is in cart Select ‘Compare with similar items’ Verify pop up box of similar items displays Close pop up box Verify pop up box of similar items is not displayed
